Truth in Plain Sight.text: The truth is in the movies, music and, TV shows and the lies are on the news. The Elite have to reveal themselves to the public eventually so the masses can accept Satan. We are taught that the movies, music, and TV shows are not real and to not believe them, but the truth is actually the opposite. If the masses don't understand this type of deception; they can push their ideology on us in subtle ways without understanding the main agenda so the masses don't awaken. Only the awakened can see through the deception.
